text: niccayamaka evarkal tankalutaiya markkattai (tam viruppappati palavarakap) pirittu, pala pirivinarkalakap pirintu vittanaro avarkalutan (napiye!) Umakku evvita campantamumillai avarkalutaiya visayamellam allahvitame ullatu - avarkal ceytu kontiruntavarraip parri mutivil avane avarkalukku arivippan
